metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6860 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: The `VideoBridge` allowed any content process to use textures produced byremote decoders.  This could be abused to escape the sandbox. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.6, Thunderbird < 115.6, and Firefox< 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
